Content.Text: Hellooo? <MYNAME>, you home?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today's our birthday, y'know! I thought it'd be
cool to throw a party, so I cooked up a bunch of
food for us to eat. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. See? Toldja it was a bunch. When I do
something, I make sure to do it right! Eat up,
okay? There's plenty to go 'round!
<PAGE>
Let's dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>There! Cleanup, done and done! Man, I'm good!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hmm? Heh heh... You look really happy right
now. I'm glad you like it and all, but c'mon! That
smile is makin' me blush!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ta-daaaah! Here's your birthday present. I hope
you like it! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><MYNAME>? I know it's kinda embarrassing to
say this so formal-like, but...I love you. Let's
celebrate together again next year!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Oh, hey. Your bag's full. It'd be a shame to
waste the present, though. How 'bout you open
a slot in your bag real quick?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure you wanna throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wha...? You don't want your present?!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
O-oh... Maybe some other time, I guess?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great! So, how 'bout you open a slot in your
bag?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, let's try this again. Here's your present!

Today was a great birthday. I feel like I'll be able
to work even harder tomorrow!
<MYNAME>, are you in?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Today is our birthday, you know. Why don't we
have a little celebration? I made dinner for us.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Someone my age should know better, but I let
myself get carried away and made a bit too
much. I hope you like it.
<PAGE>
Come, let's eat before it grows cold.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to have kept you waiting. I've just finished
cleaning up. Hm?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Look at you! You've had that silly grin on your
face this whole time.
<PAGE>
So you enjoyed my dinner that much, did you?
Ah, the meal's been well worth the effort, then.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here. This is for you. I confess I'm not
particularly familiar with youth culture anymore,
so I went with my own tastes instead.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. Nothing can be
done to close the gap in our ages, but we can
certainly shrink the distance between our hearts.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. Let's celebrate like this
every year, and bring ourselves ever closer
together.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Your bag is full. It would be a pity to waste
your birthday gift. Could you open a slot in your
bag for it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you want to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You don't want your gift?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Oh. Perhaps...some other time, then.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah. Then could you please open a slot in your
bag for it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, let us try this again. Here is your
birthday gift.
<MYNAME>, do you have a minute?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today's our birthday, if you'll recall. So I thought
I'd throw us a little party! I cooked dinner and
everything.
<PAGE>
So c'mon! Let's eat up!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Well? Did I surprise you? ...Good, good! Glad to
hear it.
<PAGE>
Everything will taste great, I assure you. Now,
let's eat before it all goes cold!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, cleanup's taken care of.
...<MYNAME>? Geez... You've been grinning
that silly grin this whole time!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Seeing you so happy makes me glad I put in the
effort I did, both as a chef and as
your...*ahem*...partner.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>. Here, I have a
present for you. I hope you like it!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><MYNAME>...Just seeing you smile like that
makes me so happy! Do you feel the same?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Of course you do! But I'm glad to hear it,
nonetheless. I love you, <MYNAME>. Let's
celebrate like this again next year.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Oh, my, it seems your bag is full. It'd be
most unfortunate to waste your present, so how
about opening up a slot for it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you're okay with throwing it out?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You don't want your present? After all the
effort I went through to pick it out for you, too...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, well. Some other time, I suppose!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, okay! Then open up a slot for it in your bag,
if you would.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great. Let's try this again. Here's your present!

Salutations, <MYNAME>. Do you have a
moment?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today is our shared birthday, you know. How
would you like to celebrate with me? I've made a
small dinner for us to enjoy.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heehee. I'm glad the idea meets with your
approval!
<PAGE>
Now, hopefully the flavor will follow suit.
<PAGE>
Come, let us eat, before it goes cold!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>There. Sorry to keep you waiting. Cleanup has
concluded!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm glad you liked it so much. That makes the
effort I put into cooking it all the more
worthwhile.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. This is my present
to you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Having the same day for our birthday is a little
romantic, don't you think? It's almost as if fate
has already bound us together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope you will stay by
my side -- and only mine -- for a long, long time
to come.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Oh, dear, your bag is full. It would be a
pity to waste your present. How about you open
a slot in your bag for it?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you certain you want to throw your present
away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You don't want your present?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I...I see. Perhaps some other time, then.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I see. Well, if you wouldn't mind opening a slot
in your bag, please...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, then, let's try this again. Here is your
present!
Hey, <MYNAME>, you home?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today's our birthday, remember? So I made up
some food, thinking we could eat together. You
want some, right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>W-well? What do you think? I tried not to make
anything too, uh...weird.
<PAGE>
But I'm not used to cooking for other people
much. So I hope it's okay. Give it a try, yeah?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cleanup's done. That should be it for now.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L><FACE_LOVE>What are you grinning about? I get that you liked
it, so stop looking at me with that big, gooshy
smile! It's embarrassing!

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Uhhhh...here. It's a present. For you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Happy birthday. Umm...i-it's kinda embarrassing
to say this out loud, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I...I love you, <MYNAME>. Stay with me, okay?
Stay by me grinning that dumb grin of yours.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Oh, hey. Your bag's full. Wasting your
present would be really unfortunate, so how
about you open up a slot for it?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure you want to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
So...you don't want your present?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Oh. Forget it, then, I guess.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's what I thought! Open up a slot for it in
your bag, then.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, let's try this again. Here's your present.
Hi, <MYNAME>. Do you have a minute?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today's our birthday, right? I cooked up a little
dinner for us, so we could celebrate together.
You hungry?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>What do you think? Geez, it looks like I might've
made too much. I hope you like it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Anyway, we should eat before it goes cold.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...There we go, all cleaned up! I have to say, I
made so much, I didn't think we'd go through it
all so fast.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L><FACE_LAUGH>Still, it's great seeing all those empty plates. I'm
glad you liked it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. I got a present for
you. I hope you like it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>I love you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Oh, er... Sorry to spring that on you. Seeing you
smiling at me like that made the words just, I
dunno...pop out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I hope you'll stay with me, here by my side, for
years and years to come.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Oops, your bag is full. It'd be a pity to
waste your present, so how about you open up
a slot for it?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you wanna throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You don't want your present?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Oh. Maybe some other time then, I guess.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, okay. So could you open a slot in your bag
for it, please?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, let's try this again. Here's your present.
<MYNAME>. Do you have a moment?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today is our shared birthday, correct?
<PAGE>
I thought we might have a quiet party, just for
ourselves. I even cooked a small dinner for us.
Come, let's celebrate!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Well? Have I surprised you? I cooked every one
of these dishes. Eat as much as you'd like.
Plenty to go around.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, it would be a pity to let this all grow
cold. Let's eat, shall we?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Whew. Who knew cleaning up after a meal
could be this much work? Ah, well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>As I am your guest, it is only fair that I do the
work myself, instead of calling my servants. I'm
glad you enjoyed the dinner.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Here. I brought a present for you. Make sure to
show the proper gratitude, and take good care of
it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>You know...never before have I had a birthday so
pleasant and enjoyable.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Since we were both born on the same day,
perhaps we are already tied together by the red
thread of fate.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hee hee...just kidding. But still...I love you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. Your bag is full. It would hardly do to
waste your present, so open a slot for it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you certain you want to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? Do you...not want your present?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I see. And after all the effort I went to, picking it
out. How cold-hearted of you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, excellent. Now open a slot in your bag.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Perfect. Now, let's begin again. Here is your
present.

<MYNAME>, are you in? Do you mind if I stop
by for a minute?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Since it's both our birthdays today, I thought we
might celebrate together. I cooked dinner for us,
too.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Mmm, it does look pretty good, if I do say so.
No need to stand on formality, of course.
<PAGE>
Let's dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to keep you waiting, but that takes care
of the cleanup.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee! Are you still grinning that silly grin? I'm
glad you liked it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. I, er...I brought
this present for you. Here.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>I hope that we can do this again next year, and
the next, and the next, and on and on.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. Your bag is full. It would be a terrible
waste if you didn't accept your present. How
about you open a slot for it?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you'd like to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You...don't want your present?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...Well, I guess if you don't want it, you don't
want it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good. Now could you please open a slot in
your bag?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, let's give this another go. Here's your
present.
Hellooo? <MYNAME>, are you home?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today's our birthday, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I thought it'd be neat if we could have a party
together. I even made dinner for us! So,
um...would you care to join me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>W-well? What do you think? I, um, kinda
wanted to surprise you, and I think I made too
much...
<PAGE>
Anyway, we should eat it before it gets cold!
C'mon, let's dig in!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, cleanup is all done. I thought I'd made
way too much, but I guess we managed to go
through it all. Wow!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm glad you liked it as much as I did.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Happy birthday! Here, I got this present for you.
I, um...I hope you like it.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Um, <MYNAME>? I'm really super happy that
you were born on the same day as me, and that
we could find each other like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I, um...I-I really, uh...love...you. A lot. I-I hope
we'll stay together like this for a long, long time.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops! It looks like your bag is full. It'd stink to
have to waste your present, so could you open a
slot for it?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you wanna throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You don't want your present?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...I see. Um, I-I guess maybe some other
time, then.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! Could you open up a slot in your bag for
it, then?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Right, let's try this again. Here's your present!

Good evening, <MYNAME>. I hope it's okay that
I'm stopping by.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Today is our shared birthday, you know!
<PAGE>
Would you like to join me for a birthday party? I
made lots of yummy food for us! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Heh. There's a whole lot, isn't there! I worked
really hard to cook all of it, just for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So we can't let it go cold, now, can we? Let's
dig in! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to keep you waiting. Cleanup is all done!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh. <MYNAME>, you have the biggest smile on
your face!
<PAGE>
I'm glad you liked dinner so much.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Happy birthday! This present is for you. I hope
you like it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Since we were both born on the same day, I feel
like it was destined for us to come together in
love like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Isn't that a wonderful, happy, super-amazing
fate? I love you bunches and bunches,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Uh-oh. Your bag is full. It would be sad
to waste your present, so why don't you make
some room for it?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you want to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? So...you don't want your birthday
present?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh... M-maybe some other time, then...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, okay! Could you open a slot in your bag for
it, then, please?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's try this again. Here's your present!
Good evening, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Erm...today's our birthday, isn't it? I, ah, thought
it might be nice if we could...celebrate together.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
W-well? I tried my best to make your favorites. I,
er...hope you like it all.
<PAGE>
We should eat before it goes cold. Come on,
let's dig in.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting. Cleanup is all
finished.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Goodness, what's that goofy look on your face?
Ah well. I'm glad you enjoyed dinner that much.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>I know this isn't much, but I got it for you. I
hope you like it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Happy birthday. What a strange feeling...both of
us having the same birthday, and coming
together like this.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>...I love you. Very, very much.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Oh dear. Your bag is full. I can't give you
your present like this. Would you please open a
slot for it in your bag?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you certain you want to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What should I do with your present, then?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I...see. That's unfortunate.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I see. Well then, would you please open a slot in
your bag?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, let's try this again. Here's your
present.
<MYNAME>, you home?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is our birthday, correct? How would you
like to celebrate with me?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>I, er...was so busy thinking of how happy I
hoped you'd look that I, ah...made too much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I hope you're hungry! Come on, let's dig in
before it goes cold.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cleanup is finished. Hm? What are you grinning
like an idiot for?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You liked dinner that much? Really? I...I'm glad.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Er...here. This is for you. It's, um...your birthday
present.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>And, er...I know this doesn't count as a formal
present but, ah...
<PAGE>
I'm aware that, most of the time, I don't say
everything I should. So I'm going to try to be
very clear this time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I...I love you. I hope that we can be together like
this for a long, long time to come.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Oh. Your bag is full. We wouldn't want to
waste your present. Could you open a slot for it,
please?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you want to throw this away?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hm? Then what should I do with your present?
Don't you want it?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Oh. Some other time, then.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, all right. Open a slot for it in your bag then,
would you?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, let's give this another try. Here's your
present.
